posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post 1" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment

posts.title: 2020년 쓰는 첫글
posts.text: 안녕하세요! 첫 글을 쓰게 되어 매우 영광입니다. 근데 아무도 못보겠지…ㅎㅎㅎ
